title: 30 Days No Plastic Challenge
subtitle: Join us to reduce plastic usage for a cleaner environment.
description: A 30-day challenge to cut down on plastic usage. Share your progress and encourage others to participate.

title: Plant a Tree Challenge
subtitle: Help us plant trees to fight deforestation.
description: Join this challenge to plant trees and contribute to a greener planet. Document your planting efforts and share with the community.

title: Zero Waste Challenge
subtitle: Commit to a zero waste lifestyle for 30 days.
description: A challenge to minimize waste by reducing, reusing, and recycling. Share your zero waste tips and tricks with others.
